description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Lebanese-Style Flatbreads recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spiced Lebanese-Style Flatbreads Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line two baking trays with baking paper. Lay 1 flatbread onto each tray.

Place mince, spices and garlic into a large mixing bowl. Season. Using clean hands, mix well until combined. Halve mixture and place each half onto a flatbread. Use your hands to press into a thin, even layer, leaving a 1cm border. Scatter onion over meat. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until meat is cooked and flatbreads start to brown.
Meanwhile, place tomato, mint, lemon juice and oil in a bowl. Season to taste. Toss to combine.
Once cooked, top flatbreads with tomato salad and scatter over feta and almonds. Slice lengthways to serve.
